field_body.paragraph: float array of 4 items in [0, 1], default (0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)

desc_content.paragraph: Color for filling region bounded by each stroke

field_body.paragraph: float array of 4 items in [0, 1], default (0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)

desc_content.paragraph: Select style used to fill strokes

list_item.paragraph: SOLID Solid, Fill area with solid color.
GRADIENT Gradient, Fill area with gradient color.
CHESSBOARD Checker Board, Fill area with chessboard pattern.
TEXTURE Texture, Fill area with image texture.

desc_content.paragraph: Flip filling colors
Display strokes using this color when showing onion skins
Select type of gradient used to fill strokes

list_item.paragraph: LINEAR Linear, Fill area with gradient color.
RADIAL Radial, Fill area with radial gradient.

desc_content.paragraph: Set color Visibility
True when opacity of fill is set high enough to be visible
True when opacity of stroke is set high enough to be visible
Protect color from further editing and/or frame changes
Color for mixing with primary filling color

field_body.paragraph: float array of 4 items in [0, 1], default (0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)

desc_content.paragraph: Mix Adjustment Factor
Select draw mode for stroke

list_item.paragraph: LINE Line, Draw strokes using a continuous line.
DOTS Dots, Draw strokes using separated dots.
BOX Boxes, Draw strokes using separated rectangle boxes.

desc_content.paragraph: Index number for the “Color Index” pass
Pattern Orientation Angle
Box Size
Pattern Radius
Scale Factor for UV coordinates

field_body.paragraph: float array of 2 items in [-inf, inf], default (0.0, 0.0)

desc_content.paragraph: Shift filling pattern in 2d space

field_body.paragraph: float array of 2 items in [-inf, inf], default (0.0, 0.0)

desc_content.paragraph: Texture Pixel Size factor along the stroke
Select style used to draw strokes

list_item.paragraph: SOLID Solid, Draw strokes with solid color.
TEXTURE Texture, Draw strokes using texture.

desc_content.paragraph: Texture Orientation Angle
Do not repeat texture and clamp to one instance only
Mix texture image with filling colors
Shift Texture in 2d Space

field_body.paragraph: float array of 2 items in [-inf, inf], default (0.0, 0.0)

desc_content.paragraph: Texture Opacity
Scale Factor for Texture

field_body.paragraph: float array of 2 items in [-inf, inf], default (0.0, 0.0)

desc_content.paragraph: Use Fill Texture as a pattern to apply color
Use Stroke Texture as a pattern to apply color

field_body.paragraph: The RNA type or default when not found.
The class or default when not found.
